person_say: I always underestimate the time to complete tasks. How can I estimate better?
animal_say: Buzz! To improve time estimation, track your tasks, set timers, and review completed tasks for accuracy!

animal_say: Buzz! Use apps like Todoist for tracking and try the Pomodoro Technique with 25-minute focused sessions!
